summary:
I am a Customer Experience Designer & Researcher working on a new venture focusing on decarbonizing real estate üåá!

If you work in Real Estate as an ESG, Sustainability, or Asset Manager, I would love to get in touch to talk about your current experience and discuss how our new venture might help solve your challenges.
